Firebrand.Description: Firebrand now adds a 1d6 fire rider to all attacks, rather than a 1d6 fire extra hit. Ascendant Element should work on both the caster *and* weapon wielder. Not 100% confident that save/reboot/load will perserve Ascendant's effects on the caster, but mostly confident of such.

SmallDragon.Description: The adorable little dragon from Dawn Of Dragons now gives his random extra damage as part of the attack, not as an extra hit.
